website_summaries.verdict: The Puma NRGY Neko Engineer Knit has been warmly welcomed by the purchasers. Its plush NRGY foam that resembles Adidas’ Boost has resonated well with the wearers. They also seem to favor the Engineer Knit upper which creates a snug fit for the foot. All in all, the shoe has been highly recommended as a comfortable and affordable option for both gym use and daily wear.
pros: Numerous purchasers describe the trainer as very comfortable
Many wearers compliment the soft nature of the NRGY foam, which makes it a pleasure to walk in the shoe
Most buyers agree that the product offers excellent value for the money, given how much it has to offer
Based on the overwhelming majority of reviews, this cross-trainer from Puma runs true to size and width
The lightweight nature of this footwear has delighted a lot of users
The upper construction makes it easy to slip in and out of the shoe, according to multiple testers
More than a few people have complimented the sock-like feel of the Engineer Knit
cons: One person finds it hard to clean the white portion of the trainer
Another customer complains that the outsole lacks grip on wet roads

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and soft underfoot Puma trainers
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy trainers. Very bouncy underfoot. I would say the fit is slightly longer than Nike or New Balance for comparison. But I’m a size 6 and they just fit without being too big, just. They are not too wide fitting though, but will give and stretch a little as they are fabric. I’m happy with my purchase and would recommend this seller. I used click and collect service as I don’t like to wait in for parcels. I was kept informed of when my parcel would be ready for collection.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes, perfect service
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t leave reviews but this was a great buy. It arrived early, it’s the perfect size and they are so comfortable!! I’ve used mostly Nike until now but if this is how Puma feels like then I’m definitely switching!
customer_reviews.author: Tiago C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym / Keep Fit Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily for circuit training rather than running and they are super comfortable and fit my size 7 feet perfectly with enough room. The shoes seem well built and with my previous experience of buying Puma trainers, should last a long time. Also fast delivery through Amazon, arrived the day after purchase on standard delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and well made but get a half size bigger for them to fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Managed to get them for an incredible price! When I Checked the next day and the price was triple! As some other reviews have said definitely order 1/2 a size smaller and they will fit perfectly.. they are very well made as you’d expect from puma, the in soles aren’t glued in but they don’t move when you tie them up. But the magic is when you put them on.. they are so soft to walk on very much like the boost material by Adidas.. possibly the same stuff? But they are great quality and feel great on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Puma Men's NRGY Neko Engineer Knit Competition Running Shoes, Black-Iron Gate, 10 UK - here are my thoughts: These kicks are really nice running shoes with a great cushioning effort that makes them really comfortable. Apparently this offers smooth support as you shift your weight from heel to toe. so is much better for you. They have an engineered, knitted upper adapts to your foot for a better fit, and overall this is a really comfortable, and stylish pair of running shoes. which I am very pleased with. Can't fault them at all. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Brit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoe at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The title largely covers what needs to be said. I've always quite liked Puma's products and this is one of their better recent offerings. Fits my broad feet well, but there is plenty of flexibility so narrower feet should not be a problem. The soles are very well cushioned, reducing impact significantly: easy to walk and run in, the uppers breath well, and the styling is neat and unobtrusive -attractive, even, as far as running shoes goes. Pricing is keen, so they are well worth getting hold of. No complaints at all here.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: Comfy And Good Looking Trainers
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are just what I needed for running. Really comfortable and absorb the impact of running well. The foam soles are really comfortable and the trainers look good too.
customer_reviews.author: DAZ

product_meta.title: Puma Men's Nrgy Neko Engineer Knit Competition Running Shoes,
product_meta.description: Teeming with PUMA know-how, these kicks are designed to sustain top running performance. The engineered, knitted upper adapts to your foot for a superb fit, but it’s the midsole where these shoes really shine. PUMA’s NRGY tech provides an unparalleled cushioning effect and enables maximum energy return, while our new SoftFoam+ sockliner offers smooth support as you shift your weight from heel to toe. The rubber outsole prevents sliding, and subtle embellishments and a sleek form will see these shoes pair well with any look.
